description:
With these skins you'll be king of the hill . . . and the flats. Designed thinner to save weight for freeriders with wide skis, the blend of 70% mohair and 30% nylon finds the perfect balance between grip and glide.

  • Made of mohair with a plush surface for smooth glide and nylon for added durability
  • Safer Skin Light waterproof membrane keeps skins as dry as possible, as long as possible
  • Ever Dry 3.0 waterproof treatment is PFC-free
  • Clicklock tip loops fit a wide variety of ski tips
  • Adjustable tail-strap connector offers 11cm of adjustment
  • Skin-trimming tool makes the trimming process easy and successful on the first try
name: Pomoca Free Pro 2.0 R2C 123mm CF V2 Skins
